title: Music--Shawms, Trombones, Krummhorns from The Triumph of Maximilian I
description: (Plates 19-20 (double-page); Car drawn by 2 buffalo. 5 players, directed by Neyschl, master trombonist, playing Shawns, Trombones, Krummhorns
creditline:
